commits: 27ace6d: fix(auto-yes): use cursor-based navigation for Claude Code multi-choice prompts
message: TDD implementation complete. Added cursor-based navigation (sendSpecialKeys) for Claude Code multiple_choice prompts in auto-yes-manager.ts. 6 new tests added, 1 existing test updated. All 48 tests pass. TypeScript and ESLint: 0 errors.

changes: In pollAutoYes() lines 339-366: detect Claude multi-choice (cliToolId=claude + type=multiple_choice + digit answer) and send Arrow keys + Enter via sendSpecialKeys
Keep existing sendKeys path for yes/no prompts and non-Claude CLI tools
Updated tmux mock to include sendSpecialKeys: vi.fn()
Updated Issue #161 test to expect sendSpecialKeys (not sendKeys) for Claude multi-choice
Added 6 new tests in 'Issue #193: Claude Code cursor-based navigation in pollAutoYes' describe block
new_tests: should call sendSpecialKeys for Claude multiple_choice prompt (not sendKeys)
should call sendKeys (not sendSpecialKeys) for Claude yes/no prompt
should call sendKeys (not sendSpecialKeys) for non-Claude (codex) multiple_choice prompt
should calculate correct Down arrow offset (default=1, target=3 -> 2x Down + Enter)
should calculate correct Up arrow offset (default=3, target=1 -> 2x Up + Enter)
should send just Enter when default=target (offset=0)

pre_existing_failures: tests/unit/lib/cli-patterns.test.ts > detectThinking > should detect thinking for claude
tests/unit/api/prompt-response-verification.test.ts > should send keys when prompt is still active
